title: Rising Rookies, Great Value Guys, and the Twitter Mailbag Returns! | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 285)
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Kevin Clark link up to give their early impressions of Baker Mayfield, Josh Allen, and Josh Rosen (02:00), then list some of their favorite non-QB second-year contracts (21:30), and wrap up the show by answering some Twitter questions (38:00).


      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
